description: My computer is running very slow and the fan is loud.
The monitor is not turning on, I see a blinking light.
My keyboard is not working, some keys are stuck.
I dropped my laptop and the screen is cracked.
The mouse is not connecting to my computer via Bluetooth.
My printer is not printing, it says 'paper jam' but there is no paper.
The CPU usage is at 100% even when idle.
My laptop battery is draining very quickly.
I need a new mouse because the scroll wheel is broken.
The webcam is not being detected by any application.
I am unable to install the new version of our design software.
Microsoft Excel keeps crashing whenever I open a large file.
I am getting a 'license expired' error for my antivirus software.
The application is frozen and I cannot close it.
I need help setting up my email client, I can't find the server settings.
After the recent update, the CRM software is not loading.
I forgot my password for the accounting software and need a reset.
The video conferencing app has no audio.
I am getting a blue screen of death (BSOD) when I run the analytics tool.
The new software update failed to install correctly.
I cannot connect to the office WiFi.
The internet connection is very slow and keeps dropping.
I am unable to access the shared network drive.
The VPN is not connecting, it's giving a timeout error.
I cannot access any external websites, but internal sites are working.
The office firewall is blocking my access to a required development site.
My IP phone is not working, there is no dial tone.
I need to have a new network port activated in my office.
The connection to the remote server is frequently disconnecting.
Email is not being sent or received, I think there's a network issue.
